txt.en:
Dear [placeholder],

You are invited to join in the events of this year's Lithe Festival. There is much to do, and so little time! The Inn League has grown, but only in response to some rather unfriendly competition from the Ale Association, which is the new faction of the dwarves.

Do not forget to visit the Taste of Hobbiton or the Thorin's Hall Keg-race. There is also fishing in Bywater... but I do not wish to spoil it all for you. Come to the Party Tree, and I will give you a better explanation myself.

Sincerely, 

Opal Goodbody

'I am too busy to talk to you! I missed breakfast, thanks to Lobelia and her wild demands! Take this guide and be off with you. It will acquaint you with all of the events this year, for I do not have time!'

The Lithe Festival has much to offer this year, and you have been invited to participate in all of its delightful events.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
Talk to Opal Goodbody at the Party Tree in Hobbiton
Opal Goodbody is at the Party Tree in Hobbiton.\n\nYou should speak to Opal Goodbody, for she has invited you to partake in the events of the Lithe Festival.
